title: Smoked Salmon Eggs Benedict With Dill Hollandaise Recipe
full_text:
Smoked Salmon Eggs Benedict With Dill Hollandaise Recipe
Jump to recipe
Prep
10 mins
Cook
5 mins
Active
40 mins
Total
15 mins
Serves
4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
recipe
foolproof hollandaise
1
tablespoon
chopped
fresh dill fronds
4
English muffins
8
slices
smoked salmon
4
large
eggs, poached
with this
method
Sliced scallions
, to garnish
Directions
Combine hollandaise with 2 teaspoons dill. Toast the English muffins and divide between 4 plates, top each English muffin with 2 slices smoked salmon, then a poached egg. Spoon dill hollandaise over each egg, garnish with extra dill and sliced scallions if desired and serve immediately.
